data.name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 - Hot Rod Custom Cars
data.detailed_description:
Do you remember classic, famous cars such as the Ford A? Do you enjoy customs? And are you still having fun playing Car Mechanic Simulator 2018? That's something totally for you! Hot-Rod Custom Cars bring you brand-new, exclusive, classic yet tuned cars directly to your garage!

Cars inspired by hot-rod models from 40′ to 60′ golden era years have unique shapes, parts, performances, and driving them is a unique experience. Discover it by yourself! Take care of old-school engines, long bodies, mirror-like rims, and pedal to the metal!

Don't forget that it's about customs. So if you want to paint the car in the flames - feel free to do it. You want the engine to be visible from the outside? Here you go. Wanna replace vintage rims and install modern ones? Let's do it!

Feel the strength of the powerful engine (and hear them roar!), incredible horsepower, the burnout, and feel free to test those vechicle beasts at the race track!

Hot-Rod Custom Cars DLC adds 5 new cars to the popular Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 game. Try it today and restore the glory days of the hot rod cars!

What's new

  • Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 Hot Rod DLC includes five CUSTOM CREATIONS of HOT ROD CARS:
-Outlaw
-Roadster
-Eliminator
-ArizonaKid
-OldDaddyT

  • Almost 100 new unique parts
  • New Hot Rod car paint styles

data.short_description: Expand your impressive cars collection in this unique Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 DLC. Buy, repair, renovate, tune, and park in your garage classic, famous Hot Rod cars! Restore their former glory and appreciate custom upgrades and tunes to have a better performance of those beautiful vintage cars!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Hungarian, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese, Greek, Portuguese - Brazil, Finnish, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows(64-bit) 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GAME DOES NOT SUPPORT Intel Integrated Graphics Cards!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows(64-bit) 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GAME DOES NOT SUPPORT Intel Integrated Graphics Cards!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB or ATI Radeon HD 7870 2GB (Does not support Intel Integrated Graphics Cards)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970 4GB or Radeon Pro 570 4GB (Does not support Intel Integrated Graphics Cards)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
